title: Get a free copy of Adelle Bold from TypeTogether
content:
**Did you use any of our fonts lately?  
Then get Adelle Bold absolutely free!!**

We are giving away full commercial licences of Adelle Bold absolutely free. All you need to do is sending us samples of your work where our typefaces are used. In addition to getting Adelle Bold in return, we will handpick and publish some of the projects in our Type In Use section, crediting the designer and linking to his or her website.

**Click [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110514/http:/www.type-together.com/index.php?action=portal/viewContent&cntId_content=2795&id_section=146) to read the instructions for submitting your work.**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015110514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TIU_Promo2_4549.gif)
author: viko
